What, as per you, is the role of developing and emerging countries in reviving the current global economic conditions

Recently, we have seen the downgrade in economic conditions not only in particular country but across the world.People suffered a lot because of this downgrade. inflation has touched all time high 8.6% which clearly indicates  that there is need to take preventive setps to overcome this problem.Especially government of india is concentrating to decrease the inflation.Unemployment, depreciation in the value of rupee, dollar becoming strong etc all these things  are playing a major role in the downfall of  economic condition in india.

                                          our  RBI governer Dr.raghuram rajan is trying hard to overcome this problem as he feels being the RBI governer it is his responsibility to reduce the inflation.He increased the intrest rates of retail banking products, removed 0% intrest scheme from credit cards and also said monthly consumer goods should be purchased at one time. He also ordered banks to maintain a liquid cash of about 750crores and only those banks which have  750cr liquid cash will be  considered as a schedule bank.

                                         Meeting are being conduted by all developed countries to overcome the problem.One example of this is the recent BRICS meeting which held at newdelhi, prime minister Dr.Manmohansingh has addressed the meeting.Dr Manmohn singh is also trying to escalate the issue to the world . He also met Barrack obama, president of u.s.a and valdimir putin president of russia to improve the conditions globally.

                            china has started a free trade zone (ftz) in shangai, where if any country wants to establish an indudry or company will get  tax exemption . In this way china is trying to attract foreign investors .India is also trying in many ways ,as a part of this india has passed a resolution in the parliament i.e  is fdi, allowing 100%fdi ,through which india is trying to attract foreign investment which give us employment and wil increase the economic condition. Chidambaram , finance minister has given a call to all nri's to come back india, as he said nri's will get many benefits as a part of increasing the financial condition. 

so lets hope that entire world will overcome the the current economic conditions very soon .Developing countries have to play a major role in this issue. To achieve this not only developing countries but also less developed countrie should focus on global crisis.
